name: Arctic Assault
description:
You'd better watch out, you'd better not cry as you take on your opponents in this fortress

Cozy cottages, mountain tunnels and wooden bridges galore! Make your list and check it twice for the best vantage point, and beware of your opponents - You are surely on their "Naughty" list!

An player-made game created by Adventure Box user C.H

To make, play and share your own online games, visit https://www.adventurebox.com
